item.title: Next Generation Scania P G R S v2.6 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | May 5, 2025

Next Generation Scania P G R S v2.6 ETS2

Changelogs v2.6
Chassis updates
– Jost 5th wheels
– 6×4 Extra Long (3750mm wheelbase) chassis. Available on all series.
– 8×4 Chassis update. Normal cab is now available for 8×4. “Tower” deflector is now accessory.

Cab Deflectors
– Short 12cm deflectors now available on all series. At the moment, not available with Air intake accessory.

Sideskirts
– “2018” sideskirts available for all 6xX, and V8 chassis.
Changable fuel tanks
– Standard and chrome variant. Available on all series

Bug Fixes
– Fixed texture bugs
– Fixed steering wheel issue on S-series Electric
– Fixed steering wheel illumination being always on
– Fixed various dependencies issues
– Added interior shadows
– Paintjob fixes. R and S series now support ALL (yes, even that one!) in-game paintjobs. Also I made some paintjobs available on P and G series.

Other changes
– More factory colors (provided by polarlicht). All colors are unlocked, so you can easily copy them to your trailer, wheel accessory, or even other trucks.
– V8 engines are now linked to V8 chassis, same with l6 engines
– DLC compatibility is now included in main mod. No additional mods required for DLC content. Only optional addon now is – No Grey Plastic addon
– R and S series in Driving Academy updated. P and G not included in Driving Academy (yet)

Credits: Eugene

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: BXP Ukraine & Russia RC 154.1 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | May 5, 2025

BXP Ukraine & Russia RC 154.1 ETS2

Southern Region and Donbass map road connection
CONTAINS: Luhansk Pavlovsk road
FEATURES: Mauriupol and Yeysk ferries
COMPLETED: fixed CTD in Mariupol
INCOMPLETE: nothing reported
DEPENDENCY: Southern Region and Donbass Map
SPECIAL THANKS: SCS, SimKA, Boris Britva and Sergey Zubarev

item.title: Scania PGR-Series by JUseeT v1.3 1.54 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | May 5, 2025

Scania PGR-Series by JUseeT v1.3 1.54 ETS2

Changelog v1.3:
– remade material for Hella SD220
– remade material for Hella Rallye 3000
– remade material for H4 (special thanks to DrOrangelight)
– edited custom flares
– fixed skins
– fixed steering wheels
– fixed front mirror
– rebuilt cabin rear wall
– optimised cab texture usuage
– added sunvisor brackets
– rebuilt 3 Series sunvisor
– rebuilt Coles Customs stoneguard
– rebuilt wipers

Credits: Model & conversion: JUseeTV, SCS (Seats, 5th wheel), RJL/LoaderSaints (steering wheel, exhaust, spoiler brackets, Euro 3 catalyst, engine and Scania badges) Scripts for navigation: DaStrobel Skins: JUseeTV, Erzi_1982 Research, reference & technical assist: JUseeTV, Dotec, Glubbschi477, Colin, etrusian

You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.

item.title: Bau Guerra 30 Pallets v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | May 5, 2025

Bau Guerra 30 Pallets v1.0 ETS2

Modeled to be lightweight but still as detailed as possible without losing optimization for the game.
It will be updated as the game develops and version updates, with more options as updates occur.
Four Chassis options;
3 axles 15 meters and 12 meters for 4×2 (stump) and 6×2 (truck) both with Original and Arched
3 Vanderleia axles 15 meters and 12 meters, both with Original and Arched
2 axles Original and Arched
Cargo interaction
Attached to the game’s cargo, in the freight market and in the cargo market, thus offering many varieties.
Compatibility with any map that uses the market attached to the game’s own cargo.

Accessories
Side Protection – Original, Without the rear part, Without any, Kitchen Opening
Kitchen on the left side of the chassis – additional as updated, such as gas cylinder, etc.
Step with wheel/tire equal to the axle – Additional with cone, three locations on the chassis
Fender – Original plastic or paintable
ADR safety plates – Plates, turned plates or without plates (With liquid divider or numbering)
Mud or mudguard – Options with light mudguard and without, for long and original mudguard
Bullish lanterns with support – Red, orange, white coloring and reverse signaling
Round lanterns on the doors
Thermoking Whisper SuperII-190, SB Line – 200, +210, +400, SXLi-400 engines, and the latest release still in WIP
Stainless steel tank for refrigerated engine with decal and plastic tanks

Credits: MJ CUSTOM

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.
